about_the_game:
You awaken in a brutalist bunker, there are no explanations, only metallic echoes and the sense that you are being watched, tested by hordes of alien creatures emerging from the shadows, attacking relentlessly. Each floor is a test designed to push your limits beyond endurance. You feel you are more than human, but why? For what purpose?

You are an experiment — a last resort, perhaps, or just another disposable piece in something much larger. But who put you here? And why does the world outside depend so much on what happens in this dark pit?

Your only way is up, facing increasingly relentless enemies, answers buried in dark depths, and one question that keeps echoing: what will happen if you fail?

Main Features:Immersive Environment: Explore a bunker designed with a unique aesthetic, creating an atmosphere of tension and mystery.

Strategic Arsenal: Use distinct weapons, each offering a unique approach to combat and suiting your playstyle.

Aiming Skill: The game is designed for players who value precision. Enjoy a responsive control system that makes every move and shot feel natural.

Fast-Paced Gameplay: Stay on the move and always alert! The fast-paced action keeps you engaged as you battle hordes of enemies to survive.

name: Project 1337: The Well

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1660Ti
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: You awaken in a bunker, at the bottom of an unknown pit, where each floor brings waves of alien enemies and a single purpose: to test you. Who are you? Why are you here? Move forward, survive, and uncover the secrets buried deep within.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, French, German, Korean, Polish
*languages with full audio support
